open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Emalahleni
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Emalahleni, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

closed.title: Vodacom Outage | Gauteng, North West, Mpumalanga, Northern Cape & Limpopo
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Vodacom network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: The impact has been mitigated and we are monitoring the network for stability. We apologize for the issues experienced.
Vodacom engineers are still working on resolving the issue. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience and understanding during this time.

closed.title: MetroFibre| Rabie Ridge
closed.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting  Rabie Ridge. Affected clients will experience no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.
closed.resolution: Please note that the fiber services in Rabie Ridge, Thembisa, and Midrand have been restored.
